system.description:
If you listen closely enough, you’ll get eaten. You gain the following benefits:

Birdsong. You gain proficiency with Performance.

Captivating Song. You can use an action to emit a captivating song. Enemy creatures who can hear you within 30 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + either your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier) or become charmed by you for 1 minute, or until you or an ally deal damage to it. Creatures charmed in this way spend their movement to draw closer to you. Creatures that succeed at this save cannot be affected again by it for 24 hours. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
